DOC.brief_summary: This study compare clinical effectiveness cost-effectiveness brief , intensified therapy diagnostic method patient mood and/or anxiety disorder Treatment As Usual ( TAU ) five outpatient Mental Healthcare Centers Netherlands .
DOC.brief_title: Cost- Effectiveness Study Brief Interventions Mood Anxiety Disorders
DOC.criteria: Male female adolescent Adolescents age 18 65 year Adolescents main complaint : Mild moderate anxiety and/or mood disorder without psychiatric and/or somatic comorbidity Adolescents proper understand Dutch language . Adolescents current psychotic bipolar trait , Adolescents homicidal suicidal risk Adolescents severe social disfunctioning No proper understanding Dutch language
